amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the CDC's Rape Prevention and Educat ion program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase CDC's Rape Prevention and Education program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 23 (Roll no. 286).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
